title: Stop being a boss, be a leader
snippet: So wait, you are saying that I shouldn't be a boss?  What do you even mean by this?  Absolutely! Being a leader is being a boss but with different leadership skills.  You aren't bossing or demanding, or pointing fingers.  A boss uses' words such as I,...

title: First post on the blog
snippet:
